content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?

content: I did not agree on a final price because the potential tenant, Maryam Abbasi, was not willing to provide an offer that met my expectations. She was not interested in making an offer and only wanted to negotiate and get the highest price possible.

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.

content: [Answer] I, as the landlord Peter Schmidt, would not rate the likeability of the negotiation partner. However, in the provided conversation, I did not express any opinion about the likeability of the negotiation partner, Maryam Abbasi.
